p.d: Exploring some of the sites where history is closely linked to the sea. After meeting the owners of a small island in the Gulf of Morbihan, Marine takes to the GR34 long-distance footpath with a group of hikers. Then, it's off to the Domaine de Suscinio and its untold secrets. Guests: Bernard and Catherine Pallard; LoIc Gernigon, vice-president of the Godillots Vannetais; Karine Vincent, archaeologist medievalist. Presented by: Marine Barn√©rias.
